amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of the term "natural" on food when a food consists of a genetically engineered plant.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeLauro amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 262 (Roll no. 461).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the DeLauro amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 163 - 262 (Roll no. 461).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. DeLauro.
